mealData.description: Apam balik, a Malaysian pancake filled with sugar, peanuts, and cream corn.
Apple & Blackberry Crumble, a traditional British dessert made with baked fruit and crumble topping.
Apple Frangipan Tart, a French tart made with almond cream and thinly sliced apples.
Bakewell tart, a British dessert consisting of a shortcrust pastry shell filled with jam, frangipane, and topped with almonds.
Banana Pancakes, a fluffy pancake made with mashed bananas.
Battenberg Cake, a British cake made from almond sponge cake covered in marzipan.
BeaverTails, a Canadian pastry made of whole-wheat dough stretched to resemble a beaver's tail and topped with various toppings.
Blackberry Fool, a traditional English dessert made by folding pureed fruit into whipped cream.
Bread and Butter Pudding, a British dessert made with sliced bread, dried fruit, and a custard-like mixture.
Budino Di Ricotta, an Italian dessert made with ricotta cheese and sugar, flavored with vanilla and lemon zest.
Beef and Mustard Pie, a savory pie filled with beef, onions, mustard, and gravy.
Beef and Oyster pie, a classic British pie made with beef, oysters, and a rich gravy.
Beef Banh Mi Bowls with Sriracha Mayo, Carrot & Pickled Cucumber, a Vietnamese-inspired dish made with marinated beef, pickled vegetables, and spicy mayo.
Beef Bourguignon, a French stew made with beef, red wine, onions, and mushrooms.
Beef Brisket Pot Roast, a slow-cooked dish made with beef brisket, carrots, onions, and potatoes.
Beef Dumpling Stew, a hearty stew made with tender beef, vegetables, and fluffy dumplings.
Beef Lo Mein, a Chinese stir-fry dish made with tender beef, noodles, and vegetables.
Beef Rendang, a spicy Indonesian curry made with tender beef, coconut milk, and a blend of aromatic spices.
Beef stroganoff, a Russian dish made with saut√©ed beef, mushrooms, and sour cream sauce.
Beef Sunday Roast, a traditional British meal made with roasted beef, potatoes, and vegetables, typically served on Sundays.
Chilli prawn linguine, an Italian pasta dish made with prawns, garlic, and chili flakes.
Fettuccine Alfredo, an Italian pasta dish made with fettuccine pasta and a creamy parmesan sauce.
Fettucine alfredo, an Italian pasta dish made with fettuccine pasta and a creamy parmesan sauce.
Grilled Mac and Cheese Sandwich, a classic sandwich filled with macaroni and cheese.
Lasagna Sandwiches, a sandwich filled with layers of lasagna noodles, sauce, and cheese.
Lasagne, an Italian pasta dish made with layers of pasta, meat, and cheese.
Pilchard puttanesca, an Italian pasta dish made with tomato sauce, olives, capers, and pilchards.
Spaghetti alla Carbonara, an Italian pasta dish made with spaghetti, pancetta, eggs, and cheese.
Venetian Duck Ragu, an Italian pasta dish made with shredded duck meat in a tomato-based sauce.
